entry.title: If You Want to Kill Somebody, Conquer His Heart ... Then Leave Them Between Death and Madness
entry.summary:
Author: StilesIsMySpiritAnimal_48

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,402Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 30

Summary: Derek Hale used to think pain came in sharp bursts — claws, fire, gunshots, loss compressed into a single unbearable moment. He never knew pain could be an echo. Repeating. Endless. Soft enough that no one else could hear it, loud enough to drown him. And the worst part was that it hadn’t always been like this. It used to be good. Better than good. It used to be Stiles.

entry.title: This Is What It Takes To Breathe (we're getting up again)
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,067Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: It was supposed to be a routine extraction. A silent base buried beneath Lublin. Thirty agents gone in less than five minutes. And a threat classified as nothing more than a bioweapon — something the SPECTRA team was sent to contain before it could spread. But there’s something else waiting in the dark. Something that moves like a rumor and kills like a certainty. Seraphim. A name whispered across black files and unmarked graves. A figure too thin to be real, too precise to be human. Every step a calculation. Every breath borrowed. Eyes like dying stars, watching without ever revealing what they see. Derek Hale has faced the impossible before — monsters, gods, and everything between. But when Seraphim turns toward him, something shifts. Because beneath the blood and command lines, there is a fracture. A question. A boy who shouldn’t exist, but does. And Derek realizes that the real danger isn’t what Seraphim is. It’s what he becomes once he’s finally pulled out of the dark.

entry.title: Nothing Like Losing a Limb
entry.summary:
Author: ash_mcj

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,402Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 1,046

Summary: Once the smoke dissipated after the tragedy at Hale Manor, the survivors of the once-thriving pack were scattered like ash in the wind. For some, the next two years passed like a suffocating gust of wind, pinning them to the burning embers they could never quite heal from. For others, it dragged on slowly, allowing their scars to fade as they watched the grass on their scorched life regrow. Though, one thing was for certain: none of them came out of the flames unscathed.[or: derek self-destructs, allison finds strength and guidance in the side of her bloodline she’d never thought to explore, cora learns to survive in treacherous conditions, jackson attempts to function without his other half, and the stilinskis try so hard not to completely crumble that they inadvertently build themselves a new pack to protect the hale territory]

entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,230Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 144

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,860Chapters: 16/22Kudos: 26

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

entry.title: ⋆⁺₊❅. The Adopted Twin Trap. ⋆⁺₊❅.
entry.summary:
Author: DevilLighting23

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,804Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Back when Theo and Liam was in a relationship. Liam wanted nothing but to start a family with Theo, however over a misunderstanding it led towards their break up. So Liam decided to adopt a baby girl named Lila, unknown to him Theo also went to the same adoption center and adopted Lila's twin brother Leonardo.8 years have passed now, the twins are both 18 years old now. And they do keep in contact with one another but never knew the truth about their fathers dating, so they come up with a plan: The Adopted Twin Trap. Leo and Lila both are making it their mission to get their fathers back together before Christmas comes and goes.Will they be successful?.
